extendedInfo.description: "Bakery Tycoon - Editor's Pick from AppEggs.com"Out of work for two years alreadyâ¦Even my loyal girfriend has left me."What in the world has happened to my life?"Just when I was about to give up on my life.. One day, one golden opportunity came to me!!She wants me to run Bakery? Why is she giving such an opportunity to a total stranger??What a mysterious womanâ¦ But I have nothing to lose! why not give it a try??Baking, dealing with customers, making coffee and cakes, not to mention managing the store!!There was no such thing as a free lunch. To overcome these burdening tasks, all I need is the legendary recipe!!My great beginning full of mysteries!How would it end?Bakery Tycoon is a business simulation game in which a player manages Bakery. It is based on an interesting scenario of real experience and composed of more mini games.-- Story tycoon --Neo and his girlfriend, and Monica, the self-claimed goddess of Bakery World and the cunning rival!Enjoy the game with the story of these four characters in a love quadrangle!-- More than 20 types of bread, 6 kinds of coffee and 4 hidden legendary bread --Experience the real recipes of bread and coffee used in Bakery World.And let's find all the recipes for the legendary bread and make the store a success!-- Mini games for Coffee, Cakes, and Street event!!! --Make great coffee and cake, achieve the targeted market share and defeat your rival who wants your girlfriend!-- Upgrade the store --Complete all the missions and quests then upgrade your store to change the atmosphere.-- 20 accomplishment emblems, 6 collections of ending mode --During the game, collect 20 hidden accomplishment emblems and 6 collections of ending mode!!-- General store, Employment center, and Secret shop --Is the game too hard?? Hire a part-time staff who will help you out.You can also visit the general store and secret shop to make the game even more interestingâInquiryIf you have inquiries or find bugs, please report to qa@eHorang.com with your device infomation.Make the world happier everyday!!! Horang Co., Ltd.------------------------------------------------Image Quality Selection: Menu Button > Select HD/SD Image qualit	This may improve game perfomance------------------------------------------------Mini game helphttp://app.ehorang.com/paris/help/minigame.html

reviews.comment: It\'s cute, fun and addicting. It makes me want to have my own bakery. Some of the recipes are real combinations. Alot of features to this game for days of playtime.
reviews.author: Jp Perez

reviews.title: NEED TO FIX
reviews.comment: When i was playing it was automatically goes black but the game is still running. I love to play this game so please fix this. Thank you
reviews.author: Mariel Tan

reviews.title: Great game so far!!!!
reviews.comment: I downloaded it yesterday and I really enjoy it. But it do have its cons which is it don\'t automatically save you have to manually save but except for that this game is the best in the market so far;-) keep up good work Horang devs
reviews.author: Ashley Anderson

reviews.title: Treq Turbo
reviews.comment: Goog game with funny graphic! Love the story too... Make who another game pls with cooking or anything else... Thanks! :)
reviews.author: Hendry Linanda

reviews.title: Axioo pico pad 9+
reviews.comment: Love...love...love..love...love... :)
reviews.author: Gerhana Ningtya

reviews.title: Very Nice and Fun to play
reviews.comment: The game is awesome. I can\'t take my eyes off of it. But, it crashes and closes on it\'s own. Please fix. But all and all it\'s a great game!
reviews.author: Azrael Belair

reviews.title: More stars pls
reviews.comment: i\342\200\230ll give it 5 if you give us more free stars pls... And pls add items/equipments that can be bought using cash at the item shop. By the way, the oven is so expnsive! Pls provide an upgrade for oven using cash only..pleeaaassse! :)
reviews.author: Myrna Salinas

reviews.title: No way
reviews.comment: It\'s way too unorganized and hard to control. I have to click customers a few times to make it work and they get angry too fast
reviews.author: Melody Lopack

reviews.comment: Its very addicting! But please fix! Sometimes you can play it, sometimes you cant. it does not load then it crashes then im back to my home screen. Grrr its just frustrating :(
reviews.author: Renz An Go

reviews.title: Wont work. Period.
reviews.comment: Sucks...Always Black screen. Never Responds, Always says, \"Bakery Tycoon is not reponding\" and then I have to close out and try again.
reviews.author: Terry Thompson

reviews.comment: It doesnt work I push play and its just a black screen, im using samsung galaxy 4\tI wish I could play it.
reviews.author: katie melancon

reviews.title: What a bust
reviews.comment: Downloaded it and it worked once. Now it force closes and won\'t load or open for that matter. Very upsettig . Love it when I played it. Uninstalled and not reinstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to play
reviews.comment: The file only opens for a second so all I see is a yellow screen  please fix it until then uninstall
reviews.author: Zabdi sosa

reviews.title: It\'s fun
reviews.comment: I enjoy it far more than bakery story.... But the screen goes black when there are certain ads on the screen... Others don\'t affect it. It gets annoying, but I still like to play it.
reviews.author: Nicole Adsit

reviews.title: Wack
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing and its really pissin me off!!!. Do your job and fix it until then uninstalling

reviews.title: Ads space..
reviews.comment: I would rate 5 if not those ads its big and annoying
reviews.author: Mark Angelo Sanguyo

reviews.title: Crashes too much
reviews.comment: Don\'t bother with this game. It opens to the t and c page then crashes. Will be uninstalling game.
reviews.author: Glenys Tranter

reviews.title: Yea.....
reviews.comment: Yea.... there are things that need fixing.. but when it is running OK, the game is good fun. Sort of a \"time wasting\" game but with as an aim to keep you motivated.
reviews.author: Carol Siu

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: I really love the game. Its not too simple and not too hard either. But it keeps crashing when i open it. I got lucky the first time i tried it.  Hoping crashing can be fixed.
reviews.author: Ina Justiniani

reviews.title: Very cute. :)
reviews.comment: I\'m really enjoying this so far; I love the visual novel-style opening and I\'m sure anyone who loves anime will love this game. My only problem is that it\'s squashed up and only takes up half my screen on my Galaxy Young so the graphics are a bit pixelly, but I\'ve seen it work fine on other phones. :/ Also, a lot of the English is quite bad. :P But overall, it\'s a great game and well the install.
reviews.author: alaric searle
